pages.text: The quest for Biodiesel will continues with another ingredient: Ethanol . To make it we need Industrial Fermenter .It will need:                                      x6 Steel Scaffolding          x2 Fluid Pipe                x1 Redstone Engineering Block  x2 Light Engineering Block   x4 Cauldrons                x4 Iron Sheetmetal.

pages.name: Industrial Fermenter
pages.text: To from it right lick on the caudron at the side which have light engineering block and redstone engineering block
